publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2420 Trish Godman: Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets-That the Parliament commends the campaign by the Baywatch Campaign, British Polio Fellowship, the Disabled Drivers' Association, the Disabled Drivers' Motor Club and Disability Now to give more protection to disabled parking bays in supermarket car parks; deplores the selfishness of other drivers who occupy such spaces with their own cars, and welcomes the initiatives taken by Asda, Safeway, Sainsbury's and Tesco to tackle this problem in a much more effective way than has been the case in the past.
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Mr Michael McMahon*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Helen Eadie*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Shona Robison*, Brian Fitzpatrick*

S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Rhoda Grant*, Janis Hughes*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Nora Radcliffe*, Hugh Henry*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Cathy Jamieson*, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Margaret Jamieson*, Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Christine Grahame*, Johann Lamont*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Karen Whitefield*, Bill Butler*
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Elaine Thomson*, Mr John Home Robertson*
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Mike Watson*
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Fiona McLeod*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Rhona Brankin*

S1M-2420 Disabled Drivers and Supermarkets (lodged on 7 November 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
